### About Me

üéì I'm a 2<sup>nd</sup>-year Computer Science student at the University of Toronto specializing in Software Engineering.

üé® I love being creative and making things, which has led to a long-standing passion for graphic design and software development.

üõ† Aside from my university studies, I am currently self-learning full-stack development.
